meanings.definition: To convert or adapt to the use of transistors.
meanings.sent1: She is transistorising the old radio to make it work with transistors.
meanings.sent2: The engineer is skilled at transistorising outdated electronics for modern use.
meanings.sent3: The hobbyist found joy in transistorising the antique record player.
meanings.sent4: In his workshop, he was transistorising the broken gadgets into functional devices.
meanings.sent5: Transistorising the circuit board brought new life to the electronic device.

meanings.definition: The act of incorporating transistors into a device or system.
meanings.sent1: The transistorising of the computer system improved its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: Transistorising has revolutionized the field of electronics.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in laughter when the teacher mentioned transistorising.
meanings.sent4: The rapid transistorising of technology is changing the way we live.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of transistorising lies in its ability to miniaturize components.
